wikipedia_page.main:
Christopher Orr is an artist.
In 2005 Orr, along with Stephen Farthing, co-ordinated the Royal Academy Summer Exhibition at the Royal Academy of Arts, London.His work was included in the Tate Triennial in 2006.

link_mentions.page: Duncan of Jordanstone College of Art & Design

response: Christopher Orr or Chris Orr may refer to:
* Christopher Orr (actor) (born 1974), American actor who appeared in D3: The Mighty Ducks
* Christopher Orr (film critic) (born 1967), American film critic
